title: Season 1 player icon
body:
I was just wondering how come I don't have a season 1 player icon? I checked my ranked history and in season 1 it says i have over 70 games which should be enough to get ranked right? but i never received a season 1 icon and I was just wondering if a riot member could explain why or give me one
thanks!

replies.body: Back in [season ](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1143351&page=1#post13402751)1 you had to reach a certain elo to get ranked rewards.  So its possible to play ranked games and not have been ranked at the time.

Dang that means I sucked hahaha
Thanks!

*Lew* was spot on here, once again. It appears the bar for ranked rewards during Season 1 was a lot higher than the more recent ranked seasons. It seems to get rewards at all, you needed to be in the top 25% of player on the ranked ladder, as per [the post](http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1143351&page=1#post13402751) that *Lew* linked.

Let me know if you have any questions.
